alert.note: Alert for Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 10:36AM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Elkhart and Cass County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow continues to reduce visibility to one quarter mile at times. DOT cameras show highly variable conditions, including poor visibility and snow covered roads. Local snow rates up to an inch per hour are still possible through midday. Lake effect snow is finally expected to weaken toward and after sunset.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
